enableautosync: Wezesha kutuma na kupokea wenyewe moja kwa moja
enablenotificationscheck: Lazima kwanza uangalie Moodle ya sehemu yako kama inawezesha kupatikana kwa taarifa, Tafadhali fungua Moodle ya sehemu yako na nenda kwa Administration / My profile settings / Messaging.Ikiwa Taarifa ya simu yako inawezekana kupatikana utaona column unaitwa Mobile Notifications
enablenotificationswarning: Ili kuwezesha taarifa kupatikana tunahitaji kuhifadhi maelezo kama simu yako kifaa chake cha aina gani na operating system in the Moodle site.
enablesyncwifi: Ruhusu sync tu inapokua Wi-Fi inawaka

errorretrievinggradeinformation: Kosa la kupokea maelezo ya daraja

helpmelogin: Kuna aina nyingi za Moodle katika sehemu mbali za dunia. Hii app inaweza kuunganisha kwa Moodle ya sehemu hii tu imetengenezwa kuweza kupata Mobile app.

norefreshdisconnected: The refresh option inahitaji kuunganishwa na mtandao

notificationsenabled: Taarifa inawezeshwa katika saiti za moodle zenu

rdebuggingenabledfor: Remote debugging will be enabled during the following seconds:
recordstored: Audio yako imehifadhiwa ndani ya eneo la siri
remotesystemnotconfiguredfornotification: The Moodle installation is not configured for sending mobile notifications. Please contact your Moodle administrator if you think notifications should be enabled.
reportbuginfo:
Tap on the email button for sending a bug report via email

Don't forget to write a detailed description of the problem in the email body

Note that some debugging information will be attached (not private information)
requiredfields: Kila sehemu muhimu zinahitajika kujazwa kiukamilifu.
siteinmaintenance: Saiti yako iko katika hali utengenezwaji
